configure-api-key-first: Please configure env {{key}} for the DemoWay MCP Server first. Learn more: https://demoway.com/docs/ai-proto/mcp/install
record-page-prompt-content: Please first use the DemoWay browser extension (https://chromewebstore.google.com/detail/demoway/nagpcohhbjekmliolabhhnmgcjndbbdi) to record the page and follow the on-screen instructions. This will allow the AI to accurately read the full content of the page.
import-page-prompt-content: Please use HTML to {{platform}} by DemoWay to import the page into Figma. Learn More: https://demoway.com/html-to-figma
